title: Any plans on a Jax VU?
body:
For a person who has the title "Grandmaster at Arms" you'd expect that character to look menacing and intimidating.

Jax, on the other hand, looks surprisingly puny in-game and he is even smaller than some of the human characters in the game. Yes, he still wrecks and duels and splitpushes like he always has but his model just seems very lacking and out-of-date.

I really hope Riot will consider giving Jax a VU soon because his in-game model clearly does not live up to the monster that is Jax. He is also my first main when I just started playing League. Still love Jax for what he is, though!
